8/ I‚Äôm happy.  I have some regrets, but it was one of the best decisions I‚Äôve made in my life.  Glad to help anybody hoping to do the same.
7/ I‚Äôm also grateful to the philly community of people that has helped get me where I am today.  Thank you.
6/ Despite all of the overtime I‚Äôve clocked, and being unlucky many times, luck has still been a huge factor in where I am today
5/ On great days ‚Äî Making new best friends, 1-1 meetings w/ amazing people that responded to my email, and gaining confidence in myself.
4/ I lost time or contact with family and friends I can never get back, and would-be partners that couldn‚Äôt deal with my maniacal transition
3/ On tough days ‚Äî Overwhelming debt, burnout, and way too much time by myself.
2/ 8 years ago today (2007), I quit my job, shaved my head, and started a new life working full-time for myself (Vuzit)
1/ Today, for the first time, I celebrate my Personal Independence Day.
